After [[Hanzō]] summons [[Ibuse]] to toss the opponent into the air and expel poison mist, he sends his [[kusarigama]] through the mist and reels it back, slicing the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* When written as 螳螂, 蟷螂, or 鎌切, "kamakiri" it refers to "[[wikipedia:praying mantis|praying mantis]]", more specifically, ''Tenodera angustipennis''.
